703618f-b.text:
Classon Avenue, north from Fulton Street. At Putnam Avenue is the Church of the Nativity of Our Blessed Lord. At Monroe Street (left background) is the Classon Avenue Presbyterian Church.

View 2 is north from Madison, showing the Classon Avenue Church.

P. L. Sperr  September 14, 1941
View 1-3
703618f-b.folder: Classon Avenue & Fulton Street, Brooklyn, NY

704547f-a.text:
N.W. corner of Fulton St. & Classon Ave., B'klyn.
